steps.title: Understanding the Scoring System
steps.heading: How Component Quality is Measured
steps.content:
Each component receives a readiness score (1-3) based on four weighted dimensions:

SLDS Linter (3x)
Deterministic violation checks
SLDS Quality (2x)
Design system adherence
PRD Compliance (2x)
Functional requirements
Security (1x)
Best security practices

Formula: score = (slds_linter√ó3 + slds_quality√ó2 + prd√ó2 + security√ó1) / 8

Readiness Levels:

  • üü¢ Production-Ready: ‚â• 2.5
  • üü° Prototype: ‚â• 2.0
  • üî¥ Draft: < 2.0

steps.title: SLDS Rule Weights
steps.heading: How Violations Impact Scores
steps.content:
SLDS linter violations are weighted by severity. Each violation type has a penalty that reduces the component score.

üî¥ Critical (0.30-0.40) ‚Äî Must Fix
  • no-deprecated-tokens-slds1 (0.40) - Using SLDS 1.x deprecated tokens
  • no-unsupported-hooks-slds2 (0.40) - Unsupported SLDS 2 hooks
  • modal-close-button-issue (0.35) - Modal accessibility violations
üü† High (0.20-0.25) ‚Äî Important
  • enforce-bem-usage (0.25) - BEM methodology violations
  • no-deprecated-classes-slds2 (0.25) - Deprecated SLDS 2 classes
üü° Medium (0.10-0.15) ‚Äî Recommended
  • no-slds-class-overrides (0.10) - Overriding SLDS classes
  • no-hardcoded-values-slds2 (0.10) - Hardcoded values vs tokens
üü¢ Low (0.025-0.08) ‚Äî Best Practice
  • bem-naming (0.05) - BEM naming suggestions
  • no-slds-var-without-fallback (0.025) - Missing fallbacks

steps.title: Example Calculation
steps.heading: See How Scores Are Computed
steps.content:
Let's calculate the score for a component with these results:

Evaluation Scores
  • SLDS Linter: 0.75/1.0
  • SLDS Quality: 1.0/1.0
  • PRD Compliance: 1.0/1.0
  • Security: 1.0/1.0
SLDS Violations (5 total)
  • no-slds-class-overrides: 5 warnings (0.10 penalty each)
  • Total penalty: 5 √ó 0.10 = 0.50 points
  • SLDS Linter score: 1.0 - 0.25 = 0.75

*Score formula applies diminishing returns

Final Calculation

Weighted Score:

= (0.75 √ó 3) + (1.0 √ó 2) + (1.0 √ó 2) + (1.0 √ó 1)

= 2.25 + 2.0 + 2.0 + 1.0

= 7.25

Overall Score: 7.25 / 8 = 0.906

Readiness: 0.906 √ó 3 = 2.72/3.0

Production-Ready (‚â• 2.5)
